Last week, I joined with all four of my Native American colleagues in Congress (@RepDebHaaland, @RepMullin & @RepDavids) in introducing the bipartisan #NotInvisible Act - which would better equip communities to confront the heartbreaking #SilentCrisis of #MMIW.

Today with heavy hearts, we draw attention to the epidemic of violence in Indian Country, and we affirm the urgent need for solutions to confront the #SilentCrisis of missing and murdered indigenous women. 
#MMIW

Although we cannot guarantee an outcome, my staff can assist by contacting an agency on your behalf.
